title: How to Draw a Basset Hound

steps.headline: Draw two teardrop shapes for the head and body.
Draw the ears drooping down from the sides of the head.
Draw the legs on the body.
Draw the tail curling around from the back.
Draw the face on the head with droopy cheeks.
Draw the crisp outlines over the under-drawing.
Erase the under-drawing and you're ready to color it.

text: Draw two teardrop shapes for the head and body.  Draw the ears drooping down from the sides of the head.  Draw the legs on the body.  Draw the tail curling around from the back.  Draw the face on the head with droopy cheeks.  Draw the crisp outlines over the under-drawing.  Erase the under-drawing and you're ready to color it.  Finished.
